channel.title: Pots help 667
channel.description:
how can i set it up so you need 99 attack to drink a super attack/extreme attack/Ovl
like you cant drink a Ovl unless your 99 att 99 str 99 def 99 mage and 99 range Super attack = 99 attack extreme attack = 99 attack Super strength = 99 strength
This is like you need 99 attack to drink the potion...
this imo would be a easy fix for a bug i have on my server.
Will Repp+++

like you cant drink a Ovl unless your 99 att 99 str 99 def 99 mage and 99 range
Super attack = 99 attack
extreme attack = 99 attack
Super strength = 99 strength
